verses.text: God is known in Judah; His name is great in Israel.
\w His|strong="H3045"\w* tent \w is|strong="H8034"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* Salem,\f + \fr 76:2 \ft That is, Jerusalem\f* \w His|strong="H3045"\w* dwelling place \w in|strong="H3478"\w* Zion.

\w There|strong="H1961"\w* He shattered \w the|strong="H1961"\w* flaming arrows, \w the|strong="H1961"\w* shield \w and|strong="H6726"\w* sword \w and|strong="H6726"\w* weapons \w of|strong="H1961"\w* war. Selah
\w You|strong="H7665"\w* \w are|strong="H4421"\w* resplendent \w with|strong="H4421"\w* light, \w more|strong="H4421"\w* majestic than mountains filled \w with|strong="H4421"\w* game.
The valiant lie plundered; they sleep \w their|strong="H2964"\w* last sleep. No men \w of|strong="H2042"\w* might could lift \w a|strong="H3068"\w* hand.

\w At|strong="H3808"\w* \w Your|strong="H3605"\w* rebuke, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* Jacob, \w both|strong="H3605"\w* horse \w and|strong="H3027"\w* rider lie stunned.
You alone \w are|strong="H5483"\w* \w to|strong="H3290"\w* \w be|strong="H3290"\w* feared. \w When|strong="H3290"\w* You \w are|strong="H5483"\w* angry, who can stand before You?

\w From|strong="H6440"\w* heaven \w You|strong="H6440"\w* pronounced judgment, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* earth \w feared|strong="H3372"\w* \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w was|strong="H6440"\w* \w still|strong="H5975"\w*

\w when|strong="H8085"\w* \w God|strong="H8064"\w* rose up \w to|strong="H8085"\w* judge, \w to|strong="H8085"\w* save all \w the|strong="H8085"\w* lowly \w of|strong="H3372"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w earth|strong="H8064"\w*. Selah

Even \w the|strong="H3605"\w* wrath \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w* \w shall|strong="H6035"\w* praise \w You|strong="H3605"\w*; \w with|strong="H4941"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* survivors \w of|strong="H3605"\w* wrath \w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w will|strong="H6035"\w* clothe Yourself.\f + \fr 76:10 \ft Or Surely Your wrath against men brings You praise, and the survivors of Your wrath will be restrained.\f*

\w Make|strong="H3588"\w* \w and|strong="H3034"\w* fulfill \w your|strong="H3588"\w* vows \w to|strong="H2534"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* God; let all \w the|strong="H3588"\w* neighboring lands bring tribute \w to|strong="H2534"\w* \w Him|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H2534"\w* \w to|strong="H2534"\w* \w be|strong="H3588"\w* feared.

\w He|strong="H3068"\w* breaks \w the|strong="H3605"\w* spirits \w of|strong="H3068"\w* princes; \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w feared|strong="H4172"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* kings \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* earth.
